full_summary:
**Next Tender Announcements**
================================


### Tender Details

* **Title**: Physiotherapy Services
* **Reference Number**: cb-4575-13100802
* **Solicitation Number**: 21421-26-4355338
* **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)
* **Contracting Entity**: Correctional Services Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario, excluding National Capital Region (NCR)


### Tender Description

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) invites qualified bidders to submit a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of physiotherapy services to offenders at Millhaven Institution. The objective of this RFP is to provide quality physiotherapy services in accordance with applicable health services standards and College of Physiotherapists of Ontario standards.

The successful bidder will be required to provide:

1. Quality physiotherapy services to the offender population, including the generation of relevant reports and findings.
2. Document physiotherapy treatments in CSC Electronic Medical Records.
3. A minimum of 144 hours per year, or a maximum of 432 hours for the entire contract period.

### Attachment and Additional Information

Additional information and related materials for this tender can be found on the [Canada Bids website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

### Contact Information

**Contracting Officer**: Danielle Murdoch
* Email: [danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 422-4831
